main_definition: A verb that means to observe or monitor something with attention.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To observe or keep an eye on someone or something regularly, often for information or safety purposes.
meanings_and_examples.example: She watches her neighbor's dog when they go out of town.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of movies and television shows, to have a role in which you appear as oneself, without altering your appearance significantly or adopting another character.
meanings_and_examples.example: The comedian starred in several successful sitcoms that watched him performing his stand-up routines.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of timekeeping device worn on the wrist to display the time.
meanings_and_examples.example: He wore a sleek, modern watches as he left for work in the morning.
